title: Tomato, Mozzarella and Basil Bruschetta
ingredients: ['6 plum tomatoes, chopped', '55g sun-dried tomatoes, packed in oil, chopped', '3 cloves garlic, finely chopped', '4 tablespoons olive oil', '2 tablespoons balsamic vinegar', '4 tablespoons chopped fresh basil', '1/4 teaspoon salt', '1/4 teaspoon ground black pepper', '1 baguette or French stick', '225g grated mozzarella cheese']
